column3: The coffee_machine would be on instead of off if in the past the the daily energy consumption of the coffee machine was not higher than the threshold.
The tv would be loud instead of mute if in the past the lab tv was not playing.
The status_light would be green instead of orange if in the past the meeting room was empty, and the contact sensor if the meeting room is opening was activated.
The lamp would be blue instead of red if in the past the window was not open.
The fan would be on instead of off if in the past the window was not open.
No explanandum found. Could not proceed.
